SELECT * FROM fd_lookup WHERE 1=1
AND code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{lookupDTO.code}),'%')
AND description LIKE concat(concat('%',#{lookupDTO.description}),'%')
AND ( code LIKE concat(concat('%',${param}),'%') OR description LIKE concat(concat('%',${param}),'%') )

SELECT fl.id, fl.code, fl.description, fl.object_version_number, flv.id AS value_id, flv.lookup_id, flv.code AS value_code, flv.description AS value_description, flv.display_order FROM fd_lookup fl LEFT JOIN fd_lookup_value flv ON fl.id = flv.lookup_id WHERE fl.code = ${code} ORDER BY flv.DISPLAY_ORDER
